snippet: A federal judge said Thursday that Florida’s county court clerks have a legal duty to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples, but he stopped short of ordering them to do so.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge said Thursday that Florida’s county court clerks have a legal duty to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples, but he stopped short of ordering them to do so.

headline.main: Florida: Judge Clarifies Ruling on Marriages
headline.print_headline: Florida: Judge Clarifies Ruling On Marriages

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
